name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard Allen HUGHES, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard Allen HUGHES, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John R. Merrick, Public Defender, R. Kerry Kalmbach, Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1011
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Richard Allen HUGHES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 18, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
John R. Merrick, Public Defender, R. Kerry Kalmbach, Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
Lee Ruslander, Chief, Appeals Div., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
